inn1.comm: Jayasuriya starts off the final with a flick. Full and on the middle and leg, turned past square leg
RP strays down leg again and Jayasuriya glances it fine. Very fine. Two bad deliveries. One has been put away.
corrects his line, gets it around the off stump, Jayasuriya plays it with soft hands, close on the off side for a comfortable single
Ah! the third poor delivery of the over. That down-leg line again and Sangakkara helps it to the fine-leg boundary. Nerves are showing.
shifts his line to outside off, full in length and Sangakkara pushes it to point. He walks towards square leg, does a few stretches and is ready now
confident stride out and he square drives to point. No swing or any movement off the pitch so far.
He hits the length just outside off and straightens it, Jayasuriya is cramped and pushes uncertainly outside the line of the ball.
takes this one away and Jayasuriya lets it go. He then bangs his bat on the ground, taps the guard again , adjusts his pads
in the zone outside off, again slanting away, left alone by Jayasuriya.

Suresh Raina has run out Sangakkara. It was pushed towards short mid-off region and Sangakkara set off for the run. Jayasuriya yells at him to get back. Too late. Sanga is already half-way down and Raina swooped on the ball and under-armed a direct hit. Jayasuriya had taken couple of steps after he had played the shot and Sangakkara responded and kept running. Enter the captain Mahela.
shout for lbw but it pitched outside leg. It moved towards leg and middle, the bat came outside the line and he was struck high on the pad.
gets behind the line of a length delivery to defend to the off side
lands it outside off and it slides further away. Mahela lets Dhoni come into play
back of length outside off stump, Mahela gets on the front foot and punches it to right of point where Rohit Sharma makes a diving stop. The ball rolls to covers.
angled across Mahela who defends to the off side.
short in length, moving away from Mahela who punches it to left of Rohit Sharma at point.
on a length, angling away from Mahela who opens the bat-face at the last minute and runs it down to third man.
On a length, on the middle, nudged to the on side.
length delivery on the middle and tailing towards middle and leg, Mahela gets behind the line to wrist it through midwicket.
Lovely on-the-up drive. He moved towards the line of a length delivery outside off and punched it on the up and through covers. Elegant.
further up and steered to the off side.
full in length, on the off and middle, driven down the track and Ishant lunges to his right to make the stop. Two men inside the circle in the leg side
back of length outside off, cut down to third man. Ishant is not happy with himself and annoyed at the width offered.
The Jayasuriya shot. Out comes the front foot and he lifts a full delivery outside off over point. The bottom-hand working over time there.
slants a length delivery across Mahela who guides to point. One slip in place
lands on the leg stump, on a length, moves in towards middle and leg, turned to square leg. Slip, short extra cover, point, covers and mid-off on the off side. Square leg and mid-on on the leg.
shifts his line back to outside off and steered to point.
short in length and well outside the off stump, Mahela went hard at the cut shot and mistimed it to covers. He then practices punching it through the gap there.
closer to the off stump, from the good length, moving away with the angle, pushed to point. RP has decided to angle everything away from the right-hander.

Rohit makes a fine stop at point to prevent a certain boundary. A tad wide outside off and Mahela cut it hard but Rohit dived to his right to make the stop.  So far the ground fielding has been sharp.
full in length, lands it outside the off stump and Jayasuriya leans into the drive and pushes it to mid-off
a tad slower, around 130kmph, around the off stump, pushed to covers
hits the deck short of length, 139 kmph, on the middle and leg, and Jayasuriya went for his short-arm pull but failed to connect. It hit him on the thigh pad.
The slower one. 109.2 kmph. Full and on the middle and off, Jayasuriya adjusts to defend down the track.
another fine stop by Rohit at point. Jayasuriya had slashed a back-of-length delivery well to the right of Rohit dives and dives well. Ishant applauds the effort.

fuller and wider and Jayasuriya drives hard to left of covers this time where Raina dives to make a half-stop. The ball rolls behind him and Jayasuriya retains the strike. This should get interesting now. Jayasuriya v RP, who has been angling every thing away from Mahela. What will he do now?
We have the answer. Jayasuriya charged down the track  and crashes a back-of-length delivery on the stumps to wide third man

Off he goes again. He likes RP. Short in length and coming into Jayasuriya who stays still at his original position and short-arm pulls it to deep backward square leg boundary. Ojha threw in a dive but couldn't stop the ball.
shifts his line to outside, again coming in off short of length, cut hard to third man where Ishant fumbles a touch but recovers quickly
RP slips back to his angling deliveries to the right-handed Mahela who moves close to the line and wrists it to the on side for a quick single
length delivery around the off stump and Jayasuriya doesn't get the room to carve, neither does he get the length to drive and defends down the track
So he decides to create his own room. He moves outside leg as he charges out, RP hurls it short and bangs it down hard and the extra bounce has Jayasuriya mistiming the cut to covers.
Full in length and just outside off, Mahela stays back and plays a lofted shot to wide mid-off region. He didn't quite middle it but manages to clear the circle.

Caught by Rohit. Sri Lanka are in a wobble here. Short  and climbing outside off, Mahela didn't quite get the room he wanted, still went with the cut but couldn't clear point where Rohit Sharma took a easy catch to his left. No timing and hence no pace off the bat. Ishant had got it to straighten and got a bit of bounce as well. India are running hot here. Can Jayasuriya turn it around for Sri Lanka?
full and on the middle and leg, Kapugedera flicks it in the air towards long leg for a single.

on a length, just outside off stump, pushed to covers. Jayasuriya does his routine: Taps his bat vigourously on the turf, adjusts both pads, checks whether his family jewels are safely guarded, adjusts his helmet and gets ready
leans forward to defend a length delivery on the off stump. Ishant has bowled very well today.
slips in a 106.6 kmph slower one on the middle and leg, tapped to the on side. He lets out a grunt when he bowls the slower one. Well at least on the two occasions today.
full  in length, angling away - RP has struck to that repeatedly to the right-handed batsmen  and it has worked - guided to point.
back of length and outside off and that length allows Kapu to stand tall and punch it through covers. Fast outfield.
back to the good length, straighter, defended to the on side
full in length and slanted across Kapu who pushes to Uthappa at short square point. Now we have two men close on the off side. Short square point and short extra cover
slips in a surprise bouncer and Kapu lets it go through.
back to the regular programming - Full length delivery moving away from the off stump, defended to the off side
Six over fine leg. Jayasuriya swivels off the front foot and pulls the short-pitched delivery on the leg and middle over the ropes. Six no 259 for Jayasuriya.
further up this time, back of length and cutting away from Jayasuriya - not much room on offer and dabbed to point
hits the deck short in length, around 138 kmph, delivery skidding towards middle and off, Jayasuriya can't connect with the pull shot and is hit high on the thigh pad
another short-of-length delivery, around 128 kmph, and a tad wide outside off and Jayasuriya frees his arms. And it flies off the outer edge over the slip
Around 135 kmph delivery, moving away from Jayasuriya who brings the fifty up for his team with a dab to third man
140 kmph length delivery that straightens outside off, squeezed off the outer edge to point
125.3 kmph gentle seam-up delivery outside off and Jayasuriya blasts it off the back foot through covers.
a 99.02 kmph slower one and Jayasuriya dashes down the track and is a touch early into his lofted shot but clears the covers. Sehwag ran back but couldn't reach it.
113.02 kmph drifts down leg and Jayasuriya tickles it to fine-leg boundary. Ten runs from the first three balls. Jayasuriya is going after Pathan.
And again. Yummy little short-arm cut over point. Typical Jayasuriya. Great to watch. A tad short in length and outside off, Jayasuriya went back to carve it up and over
127 kmph delivery and outside off, cut hard but straight to point. A deep point is in place now
114.6 kmph delivery off the scrambled seam, outside off and Jaya retains the strike with a dab to Ishant at third man
pushed to mid-off for a single
probing delivery outside off stump, It landed on a length outside off and straightened and that beat Kapu, who pushed inside the line, expecting it to cut back in.
this one shapes in towards off, defended to the off side

Ishant strikes again for India. Jayasuriya's partners keep deserting him. Again done in by that straightening and some extra bounce. It was on the off and middle line, Kapugedera thought it would come in more than it did, tried to turn it to the on side but got the leading edge and a simple catch to point.
rushing through the channel outside off, again holding its line, left alone

Would you believe it? Ishant has taken out another Sri Lankan. Kirsten pumps his fist at the pavilion. It landed on a length, kicked up even as it straightened outside off and Chamara Silva stabbed it off the inner edge on to the stumps. Again those two variables - straightening and extra bounce - does the trick for the teenager. Can Dilshan stay on with Jayasuriya.
109.6 kmph delivery well outside off stump, played to point

111 kmph delivery, full in length and outside off, defended down the track. What would Jaya do now? He was really going after Irfan. Wil he continue to do so? or Will he defend now that wickets have fallen in a heap.
another compact defensive stroke to extra cover region.
short in length and well outside the off stump, Dilshan mistimes his punchy drive to covers.
106.8 kmph delivery angling away from Dilshan who cuts to third man.
on the length, just outside off stump, worked to left of midwicket for a quick single. Jayasuriya wants to face Ishant. Here we go.
full in length outside the off and Jayasuriya, looking to be positive, drags a pull to left of midwicket where Gambhir makes a tumbling save.
full and on the middle and leg, turned to long leg

Jayasuriya is taking on the young Ishant. No nervous poking around for him. Short in length and on the off stump line and he unfurls his short-arm pull and the white ball flies over deep square leg boundary. 50 up for this wonderful batsman.

shout for a caught-behind decision. Taufel turns it down. Another short-of-length delivery, this time skidding around the off stump and Jayasuriya misses his pull and it brushes the back thigh en route to Dhoni
outside off stump, left alone
stays adjacent to a length delivery outside off and retains the strike with a dab to third man
Full and well outside the off stump, Jayasuriya kills it over covers. Waqar Younis is in awe:" I can't figure out what is he made off"!
mistimes a cut to point. He then fiddles around with his chain

dropped by RP at mid-on as he misjudged it completely. Jayasuriya messed up his pull shot and skied it over mid-on. RP ran back and couldn't figure where the ball is going to land and what's more slipped. He then recovered and threw in a lunging dive but too late.
124.7 kmph fullish delivery on the legs, flicked past square leg for couple of runs
125 kmph, short and wide, cut hard but straight to deep cover point fielder.
Wallop. Massive hit over long-on. He thrust his front foot out and swung a full delivery over the boundary.

They have spiked his drinks I tell you. Not that he needs any thing to make him hit more. This time he goes over long-off. Another imperious thrust of the front foot and a clean swing of the blade. Up up and over
Gallops to 77 with a carve over covers. After serving two full pitched deliveries, RP hit the short of length. No luck. Try something else.
Carnage continues. RP hurls it short and wide - why, you have to ask him  - and Jayasuriya murders it over extra cover. Super batting this. Great entertainment.
Oh swing and a miss. Again it was in the slot. Width offered outside off and Jaya wanted to loft it over covers

Third six of the over. The legend is on the hunt here. Banged in short, doesn't have the pace to hurry Jayasuriya who pulls it into midwicket stands. What a wallop. 26 runs in this over. Scintillating stuff. Sri Lanka's fortunes hang on Jayasuriya's bat.
the slower one, around 106 kmph, outside off, Dilshan tries to dab it for a single but fails to connect. Jayasuriya has a chat with Dilshan. Don't try anything silly, just stay with me.
leans forward to push a length delivery to covers
turned to fine leg for a single
length delivery outside off stump, punches it to mid-off
127.5 kmph, length delivery shaping into off and middle, pushed to deep cover point for a single
112.3 cutter outside off, Dilshan went back to cut to deep backward point for a single. Whoever is going to bowl the next over must have sighed in relief
outside off stump, on a length, steered to point
fuller, slower through the air, pushed to covers and Jaya shouts NO to the single
flighted outside off, driven to left of mid-off for the single that brings Jayasuriya on strike
stays back to clip a delivery turning into him to deep midwicket
on the off stump line, Dilshan goes back to punch it to right of sweeper cover for couple of runs
quicker, outside off, pushed to deep cover
Dilshan leans across to slice a full and wide delivery through covers.
126.9 kmph short and poor delivery on the leg side, Dilshan rocks back to swing it to deep square leg boundary. The counterattack is truly on.
around 112 kmph delivery, again too short and it sits up and begs Dilshan to hit. He relents to dismiss it to midwicket boundary
fuller, on a length, angling away, left alone. Dhoni is standing up to the stumps
around 111 kmph delivery, short in length and outside off, mistimes a cut to point
128.8 kmph length delivery pushed across Dilshan who punches it to covers
lands on the middle, turns towards off, pushed to covers
turns in from outside leg, worked to right of short fine leg for a single
leans forward to turn a full delivery turning into him to backward square leg
slower through the air, just outside leg stump, tapped to on side
flatter, a tad quicker, turned through square leg and by the time Ojha swooped on the ball, they run two.
floated full on the middle stump line, defended down the track. End of powerplays.
leans forward to drive to long-off
stays back to turn a flat and quick delivery to midwicket
slower, bit more air, turns into the pads, dabbed to short fine leg
arm-ball on the off stump, Dilshan goes back to punch to long-off
gets forward, doesn't find pace to work with and dabs to the off side
fuller, outside off stump and square driven to Ishant at deep point
on the leg and middle, slow through the air, turned to square leg
fuller, turning from middle and leg, driven with the turn to covers
turns in from outside leg, pushed back to the bowler
flighted full on the middle and leg, paddled to fine leg
another paddle. Another couple of runs. On 97 now.
shifts his line to the off stump and Jayasuriya eases it to deep cover region for a single
goes back to paddle a delivery on the leg stump line, misses and will pick up a leg bye.
leans forward to drive to covers
flighted full, on the middle, pushed back to Ojha
loopy delivery on the middle, driven with the turn to the off side and Ojha moves to his left to cut it
quicker, on the middle and off, punched back to the bowler
threatens to come down but Ojha remains calm and lands it just short of a driveable length and Dilshan jabs it to the off side. End of a tight over.
goes back to dab a delivery turning towards off to left of backward point.
leans forward to drive to long-off

What a hundred this has been. He gets there by turning a delivery on middle and leg past square leg. The helmet comes off, the bat is held aloft towards the dressing room and Dilshan rushes to hug him. Opener run out. Top-order crumbled. Jayasuriya counter attacked. Legend.
leans forward to push to extra cover
goes back to punch through the on side
turning towards middle and leg, tickled wide of short fine leg for a single
on the middle and leg, turning in, nudged to midwicket
leans forward to drive a full delivery to long-off
on the middle and off stump line, turning from the length, defended on the front foot.
on the back foot and forced to sweeper cover
drifts outside off and turns in, Jayasuriya is caught at the crease, stabs it off the inner edge to the on side
fuller, around off, driven to long-off for a single
a tad short in length, turning towards off and middle, Jayasuriya backs a touch to punch it to deep cover
tickled to short fine-leg region
rotates the strike with a sweep to long leg
almost a mix-up between the two batsmen. It was pushed towards covers, hesitation and they get across in time to beat Yuvraj's throw. The batsmen have a chat.
easy single this time, a dab behind point
goes back to work a delivery turning into him to deep midwicket
stretches forward to ping long-off
on the middle, Jayasuriya shuffles across and tucks it to fine leg where RP Singh makes a mess of a regulation stop to give away an extra run
just outside the off stump, short in length, cut to point
arm-ball on the off stump, pushed to covers.
comes down the track to the pitch of a flighted delivery and drives to long-off. 100 of the partnership comes up.
pushes a delivery on the middle and off to cover point for a easy single.
floated outside leg, sweeps it to square leg for a single
leans forward to drive to covers
on the middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket
just outside off, turning away, cut away for a single
full and on the middle and leg, turned towards backward square leg where Ojha lunges to make a half-stop.
full and on the middle, swept straight to Ojha at backward square leg
full and outside off ,sliced to deep point
on the middle and leg, Jayasuriya fails to connect with his paddle and Ojha appeals for a lbw decision.
leans forward to drive to long-off
slow through the air, lands on a length outside off, driven to long-off for a single
moves towards the line of a delivery outside off and drives to covers
sweeps to left of deep midwicket. The throw comes in from Gambhir and Jayasuriya, who is beginning tire, was running slowly before he picked up speed to make it in time.
short in length, just outside the off stump, cut past backward point
fuller, on the middle, turns in, Dilshan stays back, gets the bat on the ball and works it to short fine leg
dropped by Dhoni. It was outside off stump and Dilshan shaped to cut and deflected it to right of Dhoni who couldn't move his gloves across in time.
gets off the strike with a nudge to square leg
a tad short in length, turning towards off stump, cut to short third man and Robin Uthappa fires in the throw. Jayasuriya was heading for the suicidal run but Dilshan sent him back.
floated full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
slow through the air, just outside off stump, full, eased through cover point
flighted full on the middle, played with the turn to covers
comes down the track, Ojha gets it to dip on him and Dilshan lunges forward to defend
quicker, on the middle, pushed to covers
on the middle, slight turn, no pace to work with and Dilshan's dab just takes the ball to the on side and Ojha fields. Ojha has mixed up his pace very well
on the off stump line, pushed to the off side
on the off and middle, turning away, cut to backward point
turns in from outside leg, off the pad to short fine leg
goes back to work a delivery on middle and leg to deep midwicket
slower through the air, on the middle and leg, Jayasuriya is made to wait and pushes to covers
a tad quicker, a touch short in length, cut to left of sweeper cover
lands full outside leg, turns in to beat the sweep and hits the pad.
a touch short and Dilshan goes right back to cut to deep cover
goes back to turn a slow delivery turning into him to square leg
the first risk he has taken in some time. He moved outside leg, Ojha fired in a quicker one on the middle, stabbed to cover point
slower, fuller, driven to long-off for a single.
moves towards middle and off, Ojha slows up the pace, keeps it full, turned to backward square leg
quicker, full driven through covers where it's mis-fielded
leans forward to defend a delivery turning from outside off
nice action, drifts outside off and turns into middle and off, nudged to cover point
goes back to punch a quicker delivery to covers
stays back to jab a delivery turning from outside leg to front of square leg . It was in the air briefly, no damage done, though.
leans forward to push to left of covers, sets for a single and is sent back by Jayasuriya.
goes back to work a delivery turning into middle to backward square leg fielder
turns into the leg stump and pulled to long leg
leans forward to defend to covers
on the middle and turning, driven towards long-off
on the middle, swept to the man just behind square leg
threatens to come down, Ojha bowls a dipping full delivery on middle and leg, paddled to long leg
goes back to push a delivery turning in from middle and leg to deep midwicket
turns from off towards middle and leg, pushed to covers
leans forward to drive to long-off

Sehwag is the man who does the job for India. Jayasuriya is gone after a superb ton. He went down on his knees to play the slog-sweep but found Ishant at deep midwicket. He is really disappointed as he trudges off, shaking his head. He had slowed down after reaching the ton, as he wanted to stay for the death overs but it hasn't gone according to the plan. India will take it, though.
full and outside off, driven to long-off
full and on the middle and leg, swept to long leg
turns away after landing on the off and middle on a length, nudged to the off side
slow through the air, outside off stump, a touch short, cut to left of deep cover where Gambhir fumbles
flighted full around off stump, punched to sweeper cover
on the middle and leg, turned past square leg
full and on the middle and leg, Dilshan stays back to wrist it past square leg and that's his 14th ODI fifty. A very valuable hand. No risks taken.
leans forward to turn a full delivery to midwicket
goes back to turn a slightly short-of-length delivery turning into him to deep midwicket
flaoted full, driven back to Sehwag
turns from leg stump, worked to midwicket
gets forward to push a flighted delivery to extra cover
goes right back to turn it past square leg for a single
keeps low after landing on a length around middle and off, Dilshan jabs it across the line to midwicket
again stays back to a full delivery outside off, bends his knee to push it through cover point
the slow off cutter, short in length, pulled to left of deep midwicket for couple of runs.
lands on a length, on the leg stump line, turned behind square leg for couple of runs
cut away for a single

That angle works. He fires it short of length and Dilshan tries to fetch a pull from outside off stump and top edged a dolly to Dhoni. Busy little valuable innings comes to an end at the wrong time for Sri Lanka. India have seized the advantage again.
stays back to punch a short-of-length delivery to covers
floated full on the middle and off, driven to long-on
turns outside off, squeezed to short third man
leans forward to turn to midwicket
outside leg, swept to deep midwicket
turns towards middle and leg, dabbed past square leg
goes for the sweep, misses and it bobs away of the pad to the off side
short in length and cuts away well outside off, cut and a miss.
back of length, again a tad wide outside off, punched to deep cover
a tad fuller, straighter, on the middle and off, stabbed off the inner edge on to his pad and it rolls to the off side.
Vaasy breaks free with a lovely square drive. A boundary after a very long time.
hits the short of length, on the off stump line, pushed to the off side
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
short and wide, cut hard to deep cover
from round the stumps, coming into the off stump, run down to third man for a single
fuller, just outside off stump, turned to midwicket
fullish, outside off, slashed to wide third man
full, almost yorker length outside off, Kulasekara goes for the drive but can't connect.
dot ball as Vass pushes a length delivery to midwicket
fuller, moving away from Vaas who drives to deep cover region
short in length, on the off and middle, Kulasekara opens his stance up and tries to pull of an ambitious pull but mistimes it to midwicket
beaten by the slower one. 101.4 kmph delivery, full in length and well outside off, Kulasekara has a stab and a miss.
short in length, holds its line outside off, pushed towards mid-on for a single
full and well outside off stump, square driven well to the left of wide third man region where Sehwag just about manages to kick it back into play. Ishant is livid with himself for offering width.
cutting in to the off stump, pushed to the off side
leans forward to drive a full delivery to covers
stays back to work a full length delivery on middle and leg to long leg
the bouncer from round the stumps, Kulasekara ducks
short in length, coming at the rib-cage, swivels to short-arm pull but can only jab it to short fine leg
length delivery outside off stump and Vaas stands tall to carve it just over covers
starts off with a wide down leg side
length delivery angling across Kulasekara who nudges it to gully region
pushes a short-of-length delivery to covers
fuller, edges a drive to the on side.
cleaned up. Fuller, shaping into middle and off, Vaas goes for the big drive that was needed at this time but couldn't connect. Clatter.
walks outside off and defends a length delivery cutting into the off stump line
cuts in off a length, pushed down the track. The big hits and the runs have dried up
Another dot ball. just outside the off stump, steered to backward point.
fuller, straighter and Kulasekara gets the scorers working with a straight drive. Irfan Pathan is touch late on the dive at mid-on and it runs past him
kicks up from short of length, pushed towards extra cover, Yuvraj fires in a throw at the non-striker's end but misses. He could have got a run out had he hit
short in length, coming in from outside leg, turned to short fine leg region
fullish, outside off stump, dragged down to long-on
slanted across Kulasekara who pushes through cover point for a single
full, right up there, on the off stump, heaved to midwicket. Just a single, though.
full and angling away from Kulasekara who slices it just over backward point. RP thought he had the man, throws his head back in disappointment and then has a big smile
RP smiles again as another mistimed shot- a pull - lands just short of the mid-on fielder
fullish, on the leg and middle, deflected past square leg
another run out chance missed. Raina this time. It was pushed towards short midwicket region, Raina rushed in, fired in a throw but missed the sticks
fires in a bouncer and Thushara can't get wood on leather.
swings a full delivery to deep midwicket. Last five overs just 24 runs.
some oxygen in the death overs. Short and wide, Kulasekara, who had moved outside leg, carves it high and to the wide long-off boundary
straighter, on the middle, tucked to the on side for a single
fullish, outside off stump, dragged to wide midwicket region for  a single
trapped in front. The slog across the line didn't work. It struck him in front of middle and leg and would have hit the leg stump.
outside the off stump, from round the stumps this time, dabbed to backward point. He is sent back and gets back in time to beat the throw from Rohit
edged past Dhoni. Homing in on the off stump and Mendis edges the waft and Dhoni is late on the dive. RP smiles at him.

ah! another profitable edge through the vacant slip region. Jayasuriya is laughing as he claps! Mendis was trying to work the length delivery to the on side and edged it well to the right of Dhoni who can only watch it go past him
RP terminates Mendis's innings with a delivery angling in from round the stumps that moves past the swipe across the line to crash into the stumps
outside the off stump, dabbed to third man for a single
well outside the off stump, dabbed to backward point for the single
full and on the middle, mistimes a drive to long-off and Murali seizes the opportunity to come back for the second run.
superb shot! It was from round the stumps, landed short in length and Kulasekara fisted it on the up and through extra cover
fuller, outside off, sliced to Ishant at deep point region
length delivery well outside the off stump, Murali attempts a slog across the line and gets a thick outside edge.

inn2.comm: Vaas beats him straightaway with a delivery that shapes away late. Gambhir was trying to run it down to third man
tails back in towards middle, worked to midwicket
length delivery cutting away from Sehwag who goes right back, tries to punch it square and gets a outside edge to third man.
it landed full in length around off and shaped away, Gambhir moved close to the line, opened the bat-face and ran it between the slip and the wide third man fielder.
lands outside off stump, keeps a touch low as it moves away from Gambhir who shoulders arms.
fuller, closer to the off stump, driven to mid-off
What a welcome. Sehwag lunged forward to heave a full delivery around off stump over to wide midwicket region. Talk about intent. So is this how he is going to play?
dragged back the length to hit the good length, on the off and middle line, Sehwag pushes it back with the full face of the bat
full in length, skids towards middle and off, pushed to mid-on
fuller and Sehwag clears the front leg but mistimes a big drive to left of mid-off where Tushara fumbles while diving
back of length, comes in, Sehwag is early into his punch-drive, the ball is in the air briefly, but lands and rolls away to wide mid-on region
walks down the track, Kulasekara pushes it outside off and Gambhir leans across to square drive to covers
length delivery straightening on the off stump, pushed back down the track
slower one, full and on the middle and leg, Sehwag waited before wristing it very fine to the fine-leg boundary. very well adjusted.
back of length, on the middle, clipped to midwicket
leans forward to cream a full delivery outside off through extra cover. Lovely swing of the bat.

Fabulous shot down the ground. It was full and on the off and middle, Sehwag thrust his front foot out and lifted it straight over the umpire's head and he stood at the end of the followthrough for a pose. Freeze frame. Great shot. Still head.
Vaas drags back the length but slips on the leg stump line and Sehwag pulls it past the short fine-leg fielder. India are up and running.
gets forward to drive to covers
outside off stump, on a length, square driven past the short square point fielder but the backward point cuts it
walks into the line of the delivery to push it towards mid-off for a quick but well-run single.
dropped by Sangakkara. It was short and climbing outside off, Sehwag went for his upper cut over the slips but edged it over Sangakara who jumped but ended up palming it over like a goalkeeper.
cutting into middle, turned to wide midwicket
how did that miss the off stump? Phew. It skidded on off short of length and Gambhir went for the pull, missed and it rushed past the off stump and Sanga didn't gather cleanly
125.2 kmph short-of-length delivery bouncing over middle stump. Where was Sehwag? He had opened his stance up and tried to slog it over midwicket.
the slower one, full, pushed to point region
short in length, kicking up, pulled past square leg for a single
cutting into middle stump line, worked to square leg
length delivery homing in to the off stump, punched to short extra cover to Mahela who turns around to fire a direct hit at the non-striker's end. Sehwag was inside.
Vaas strikes. A tad slower, from short of length, cutting in from outside off, Gambhir is early into the cut and finds point fielder. Mahela erupts in joy. Gambhir looks ruefully at his bat.
on a length, around middle stump, turned past square leg.
leans forward to push to covers
fullish, on the off stump line, Raina tries to work it to on side - only two men there - but couldn't connect well and Kulasekara runs on from his follow through to pick up the ball
the bouncer rushing past the off stump, Raina sways away and gets his bat down.
beaten outside off.  Raina tried to punch a length delivery through wide mid-off and missed it completely as the bat went well inside the line
slower and on the middle, punched to mid-on
slower one, outside the off stump and since Mahela has the third man up inside the circle  and Sehwag opens the bat-face  and runs it between backward point and short third man
shuffles across and whips a full delivery to mid-on. He is not happy with himself, he wanted to whip to the right of the fielder
Sehwag walks across the stumps and pulls a short of length delivery on middle and off to fine-leg boundary.
slow off cutter, around off, pushed to the covers. Lots of cute fielding postions. Short midwicket, short fine leg, short square point. Mahela is trying to some how get a wicket

Another slower one, fuller this time and on the off stump. Sehwag clears his front leg and drags a big slog to wide midwicket boundary. Sangakkara comes up to the stumps. Sehwag is rattling along here.
short in length, again that front leg is placed outside leg, the stance is opened-up and he swing to deep midwicket
The fine leg is up and they continue to pay for it. Sehwag goes right back to flick a short-of-length delivery coming into him past the man stationed inside the circle.

Classy shot. Unstoppable Sehwag. And he has reached his fifty. In a blink. It was pretty full outside off stump, Sehwag bent his back leg and square drove it superbly to beat the third man fielder. Great timing.
pushes to the leg side.

slower one, short in length on the off and middle, Sehwag backs away a touch and cuts hard to right of backward where Dilshan makes a half-stop, recovers quickly to have a shy at the striker's end. Had he hit , Sehwag would have been gone.
fuller, straighter, driven to mid-on
banged in short of length, coming into  the body, pulled to Vaas at long leg
And where does he bowl? Outside leg stump. Sehwag shuffles to flick it away. Mahela winces.
shifts his line to middle and off and Sehwag leans forward to defend the length delivery to the off side
Oh the runs are coming in a flood here. on the leg and middle and Sehwag knows the fine leg is up, shuffles towards middle and clips it past the fielder
again a slight shuffle across and he whips a length delivery on middle to deep square leg
Raina chips in with a shot that oozes class. He went back and across to punch a length delivery through extra cover.
The fourth boundary of the over and the two batsmen have a laugh in the middle of the wicket. Again he went back and forced a short-of-length delivery through covers. Super timing.
he threatens to jump out, it cuts away after landing on a length on the middle and off and he lunges to defend. Sehwag is looking to after the bowler without having much of a look at him.

Mendis has done him in. Sehwag charged out, Mendis flicked the ball short of length and cut it away, Sehwag tried to change his shot and cut the ball but missed. Mendis has his man stranded down the wicket. Great moment for the young mystery spinner. The carrom ball has worked.
lands on a length on the middle and it cuts in, Yuvraj picks it off the turf and dabs to the on side. He didn't pick that

What a little bundle of talent. Pocketful of mystery. Yuvraj is castled. It was flicked on a length on the middle stump line and skidded on straight. Yuvraj played all around it. Gone! And Sri Lanka roar back into the game. Thrilling stuff. Finger-flicking good!
cuts in, dhoni goes right back to push it to the off side.
leans forward to push a full delivery to to left of backward point
coming into middle and leg, worked past square leg
well outside the off stump, slanted across, left alone
walks towards the off stump and drives to right of mid-off for a single
short in length, outside the off stump, punched to covers
shout for lbw as a yorker evades the waft across the line and hits the leg around the leg stump line. It would have gone down leg side
lands on a length, on the middle and off and skids on straight, Dhoni is on the back foot, picks it off the pitch and squeezes it past the slip
leans forward to push it to extra cover

huge shout for lbw but Taufel turns it down. Close. It landed on a length, on the leg and middle and skid on. Raina, unsure, got his bat down outside the line and it would have hit the middle. He was on the front foot, no doubt but it was going straight on.  Difficult for the batsmen and the umpires to pick
leans forward to defend
jabbed to the off side for a single
Dhoni stays back to defend a delivery skidding off a length.
length delivery that holds up a touch and Raina checks his on-the-up drive and it goes in the air but lands close on the leg side well short of any fielder
breaks free with an elegant extra-cover drive. He leaned into his drive and timed a slower delivery superbly through the off side
on a length, coming in, turned past square leg
cuts away after landing on a length, pushed to covers
fuller and well outside off, Dhoni stretched across to cream it through extra cover.
stretches across to push a full delivery to covers
lands on a length, on leg and middle and cuts towards middle, defended down the track
Mendis you little beauty! Poor shot, though from Raina. It skidded on off a length on the middle and Raina went for the pull shot. Talk about wrong shot selection.
leans forward to defend
on a length, skdding on, defended

another big shout for lbw. Again looked pretty close. Again turned down by Taufel. It was the two-fingered googly. It cut in after landing on a length on the middle and off, Rohit was clueless about its destination, shaped to leave it, saw the ball cutting in, got his bat down in a hurry but was hit on the pad first and in front of the middle. Taufel gave it as runs.
run down to third man for a single
leans forward to push to extra cover
pushed to mid-on for a quick single
outside the off stump, steered to point
gets behind the line of a length delivery to punch to the off side
leans forward to drive a full delivery back to the bowler

Don't you mess with Mendis. Rohit has no clue either. One by one he is flicking them out. This one landed on a length on the middle, Rohit shaped to work it across the line. Mistake. The ball cut in towards middle and hit his back leg. I wonder how good he was as a kid at carrom. Take the "red" boy!
leans well forward to defend
leans forward to turn to wide mid-wicket
Dhoni is on the back foot and he squeezes a delivery on the off to point
fuller and Dhoni comes forward to defend down the track.
outside the off stump, going on straight, Robin tries to dab it to third man and is beaten. He then practices playing in the V.
The bouncer and Robin ducks
leans forward to run a length delivery to third man
outside off stump, on a length ,steered to point
leans forward to drive to mid-off
leans forward to push to covers
on the middle stump line, skids on, pushed to short mid-off region
drifts on to the leg stump, Robin shuffles a touch and glances it fine. 100 up for India.
short in length, moving away from Robin who opens the bat-face and guides to third man
walks towards middle, Thushara follows him and its turned to midwicket
leans forward to punch a length delivery to mid-off
back of length, outside off, pushed to mid-off
turns in from well outside off, from short of length, Robin tries to cut but is cramped as the  ball turns in and pushes it to the off side
goes back to work a delivery turning into him to midwicket
outside off, doesn't turn in as much as Robin thinks and he stabs it to the off side
leans forward to defend to the off side
almost trapped by the doosra. It landed full on the middle and leg, he had gone across, managed to get his bat down in time and squeezed it to square leg
outside off, shorter and quicker, Dhoni is beaten on the cut
shuffles across to push a full length delivery close on the off side for a quick single
overpitched outside off and Dhoni square drives to cover point boundary.
walks down the track, goes across towards off in the process, and tries to turn a length delivery to the leg side, misses and is struck on the pad. It would have missed the off stump
another walk across and he wrists a full delivery on middle to long leg
leans forward to defend to covers
curves in from outside off stump, defended to the off side.
doosra, steered to cover point
leans forward to defend to the on side
outside off, cut past point
rips a off break across, full and just outside off, Dhoni is on the back foot and he steers to backward point
on the back foot and pushes a ball turning into him back down the track
stretches across to push a flighted delivery towards covers, sets for a run and is sent back by Dhoni
on the middle and off, pushed to wide mid-on for a single
leans forward to drive to deep cover
leans forward to punch a length delivery to the on side
slanted across him, mistimes to covers
walks down the track and drives to extra cover
short in length and a tad outside off, punched away to right of sweeper cover
slower through the air, spins to the leg stump line, Robin goes for the pull, too early into the shot and it rolls off the body
leans forward to drive a flighted delivery outside off, the bat comes down outside the line and it jams into the pad and then on to the bat and rolls down the track
goes back to punch it back to the bowler
shuffles to turn a doosra on the leg and middle past square leg
stretches across to defend a full length delivery outside off
reaches across to drive a flighted delivery outside off through extra cover. Very well played.
leans forward to drive to sweeper cover
walks down the track and across to the off side and then decides to let a length delivery outside off go through to the 'keeper
leans forward to drive to long-off
driven towards long-off for yet another single
goes back to cut but the ball spins big and he pushes it to the off side
leans forward to drive to deep cover
goes round the stumps for Robin and turns one from outside off, Robin stabbed it of the inner edged on to his pad
on the middle and leg, turned to short fine leg
lands on middle and leg, spins in from round the stumps angle, past the forward prod and strikes the pad. Going down leg.
leans forward to defend to the on side
full pitched outside off stump, driven to sweeper cover
outside the off stump, slanting away, tries to cut down to third man but it rolls to the right of Sangakkara
Robin is standing well outside the crease and Thushara fires in a short-pitched delivery angling across him, Robin withdraws his bat from the line
he now stands with his back leg on the crease and is beaten as he chases a short and climbing delivery leaving him
dabbed to third man for a single
another short-pitched delivery, climbs chest-high and rushes through outside off channel. Dhoni watches it fly past him.
doosra from round the stumps, pushed to covers
leans forward to turn a flighted off break on the middle to short fine leg
breaks free off the shackles with a reverse sweep. He sent the ball on the middle stump line to third man boundary.
quicker, fuller, turned past square leg
over the stumps for Dhoni who goes back to tap a delivery turning into off and middle to square leg

Trapped in front. It landed full, from round the stumps, on the middle and off, turns in to evade the forward prod and strikes the pad in front of the middle. Sri Lanka are perched on top. What a evening it has been. Mendis flicked away the top order and now Murali has started to spin his way into the second half.
Dhoni is the last man standing and he drills a full pitched delivery on the off stump to long-off boundary
short in length, slanted across the off stump, mistimes a pull to wide mid-on. Over throws at the striker's ends.
short in length, outside off stump, punches to the on side
overpitched outside off and driven hard to long-off
outside the off stump, steered to deep cover
short and pulled to deep midwicket
loopy delivery on the middle, nudged to on side
goes back to punch a delivery turning in from outside off stump to deep cover
leans across to drive to covers
doosra on the middle but short in length and Irfan goes back to pull to deep midwicket
fuller, outside off stump, pushed to extra cover
flighted full on the off ,driven to long-off
leans forward to turn a delivery turning in to midwicket
loopy  flighted one on the off stump, slower through the air, defended to the on side
flicks it in, towards off and middle, pushed to the on side
flicks this one away and Dhoni is beaten as he tries to punch it through the off side
skids on after landing on a length to defend
slower, loopy flighted full on the off, Dhoni lunges to push and it runs of f the outer edge through point
leans forward to defend to the on side
spins in from outside off stump, defended on the front foot
well outside the off stump and it turns in , Dhoni is beaten on the cut
the doosra on the leg stump and Dhoni plays his special vertical sweep past the short fine leg fielder
slow and flighted well outside off, Dhoni charged out and tried to heave it over the on side but edged it on to his boot
turned past square leg and they run really hard
fuller delivery, driven to mid-off
pitched on middle and off, defended back to bowler
googly - fuller and going away from Pathan, who got on his front foot to defend and just managed to edge it to first slip.

What a little champion! They are not reading him at all. RP lunges forward, the ball lands on a length on the middle, the bat goes down the line but it was flicked away and it cut quickly towards the off stump. Clatter! Oh boy they are going to be at the video guy before the series in Sri Lanka next month.

Almost the hat trick. Taufel doesn't agree with the lbw shout; It skidded on straight after landing on a length on the middle and off, the bat was outside the line and he was in hit on the pad. Perhaps,. Taufel thought it would have gone over the stumps. The replays suggest it would have hit the top of off stump. Hmm...Neither the batsmen or Taufel is picking him
leans forward to push to the off side
leans forward to defend
outside off stump, pushed to covers
short in length, off cutter, defended down the track
leans forward to square drive a full length delivery to point
fuller and outside off, driven to long-off
full again, just outside off stump, Ojha stabs it off the inner edge to the leg side
full in length and on the middle, defended to the on side
leans forward to poke a length delivery outside off and it runs off the outer edge to third man
on a length , coming in, runs off the inner edge to short fine leg
full and outside off, left alone
gets close to the line of a length delivery and pushes to covers
off cutter outside off, full, Dhoni walks across the sticks, nudges it close on the on side. Thushara has a shy at the non-striker's end
goes back to work a length delivery on the middle and leg past square leg

Sharp catch by Sanga, standing up to the stumps. Full in length outside off stump  and Dhoni went for a extra-cover drive and inside-edged to Sanga who pouched it safely. All the Sri Lankans converge near the centre pitch and are in a huddle of a joy. The game is all but over. Sri Lanka will win another Asia Cup.
rushing past the off stump and ,left alone.
moves in from outside leg and strikes the pad
swing and a miss. Full and outside off stump.
on the off stump, squeezed to point. Will Mendis bowl the next over?
full in length, outside the off stump, pushed towards mid-on, Mendis runs after it and after some hesitation the batsmen cross over
flatter, quicker, skids on straight on the middle, stabbed back down the track
slower, short in length, outside off, steered to cover point
gets well forward to defend a delivery on the leg stump
quicker through the air, skids in, hits the pad but missing leg.
similar delivery, again going down leg when it hit the pad. Nervous energy in that over. He wanted to get a wicket and fired in most of his deliveries and just off target
leans forward to defend a length delivery down the track
leans forward to push a full delivery to covers
slower one outside off stump, Ishant has a big swing but no wood on leather
short in length, quicker, cutting away from Ishant who is squared up and edges it between Sangakkara and a diving Mahela who was standing at a wide slip
fullish, outside the off stump and scoops it to wide mid-off region. It was in the air but landed safely well to the left of Jayasuriya
run out chance missed. It was pushed to point and he set off for a run, turned down by Ishant and the throw missed the stumps
on the middle and leg, defended to the on side
the off break this time, turns in to beat the forward prod and probably, was going down leg side
another off break, turned to midwicket. Ishant reaches the other end and shouts to Ojha, off spin off spin.
leans forward to jab a skidder to the off side
slower, lands outside leg stump, breaks back in, jabbed to short leg
fuller and outside off, driven to covers
lunges forward and is beaten by the big-spinning off break
fuller, outside off, squeezed to backward point region
goes round the stumps, bowls a doosra that lands outside leg, beats the waft and strikes the pad
dropped by Murali. The off break on the middle and off, driven to left of Murali who lunges with his hand outstretched but clanged it
driven to long-on for a single
leans forward to steer a flighted delivery on the middle and off to point region
full and moving outside off stump, beaten on the drive
outside the off stump, dabbed to third man

Sri Lanka win the Asia Cup. Kulasekara cleans up Ishant with a full and straight delivery that beats the big drive. Mahela pumps his fist and turns to hug Jayasuriya. One by one, they all troop in and get into a huddle. They break away now. Congratulations to the champions. The Indian team stand on the staircase and shake hands with the Sri Lankans.
